subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: After a postseason ban and multiple defections, Shabazz Napier, Tyler Olander and Niels Giffey “saved this program,” the second-year Coach Kevin Ollie said.
snippet: After a postseason ban and multiple defections, Shabazz Napier, Tyler Olander and Niels Giffey “saved this program,” the second-year Coach Kevin Ollie said.
